Title: An Act Changing the Name of Lapulapu Street in Danao City to Paulo G. Almendras Street
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 676
An Act Changing the Name of Lapulapu Street in Danao City to Paulo G. Almendras Street
Section 1. The street in Danao City, in the island of Cebu, Philippines, now known as Lapulapu Street, is hereby renamed, and shall be known as Paulo G. Almendras Street.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: March 7, 1984
